Age.description: Age of the individual in years

Height.description: Height of the individual in meters

Weight.description: Weight of the individual in kilograms

family_history_with_overweight.description: Does the individual have a family history of overweight?

value_dict.yes: The individual has a family history of overweight
value_dict.no: The individual does not have a family history of overweight

FAVC.description: Does the individual frequently consume high caloric food?

value_dict.no: The individual does not frequently consume high caloric food
value_dict.yes: The individual frequently consumes high caloric food

FCVC.description: Frequency of consumption of vegetables in the individual's diet

NCP.description: Number of main meals the individual has in a day

CAEC.description: Consumption of food between meals for the individual

value_dict.Sometimes: The individual sometimes consumes food between meals
value_dict.Frequently: The individual frequently consumes food between meals
value_dict.Always: The individual always consumes food between meals
value_dict.no: The individual does not consume food between meals

CH2O.description: Daily water consumption of the individual in liters

SCC.description: Does the individual monitor calorie consumption daily?

value_dict.no: The individual does not monitor calorie consumption daily
value_dict.yes: The individual monitors calorie consumption daily

FAF.description: Frequency of physical activity for the individual in a week

TUE.description: Time using technology devices by the individual in a day

CALC.description: Frequency of alcohol consumption for the individual

value_dict.no: The individual does not consume alcohol

value_dict.Public_Transportation: The individual primarily uses public transportation
value_dict.Automobile: The individual primarily uses an automobile
value_dict.Motorbike: The individual primarily uses a motorbike
value_dict.Bike: The individual primarily uses a bike

value_dict.Overweight_Level_I: The individual is in Overweight Level I
value_dict.Overweight_Level_II: The individual is in Overweight Level II
value_dict.Obesity_Type_I: The individual is in Obesity Type I
value_dict.Obesity_Type_II: The individual is in Obesity Type II
value_dict.Obesity_Type_III: The individual is in Obesity Type III
